articles.author: Dean Bilton
articles.title: Lionel Messi's move from Barcelona to PSG both proof and a result of European football's broken system - ABC News
articles.description: As a tearful Lionel Messi is forced out of Barcelona and into PSG's waiting arms, his sadness should be all of ours — not just for what the game is losing, but for what that loss represents, writes Dean Bilton.
articles.content: If ever an image can sum up the current state of European football in all its cold and bloated glory it is that of Lionel Messi tearfully explaining why he can't play for his beloved Barcelona anymor… [+4610 chars]
